message: I propose a fair split, 90% for me and 10% for you. Let's get this done quickly.
Let's be reasonable here. I'm offering you a fair 40%, which is still more than you'd get if we keep rejecting each other.  Think about it, each round we lose 20% of the pot!
I'm not happy with 40% after our initial deal. This time, let's go 50/50. We've both lost money already, so let's end this fairly.
